prompt: Create a vibrant QR code scanner page with a light gray background. Feature a rectangular viewfinder with rounded corners and a red border, positioned slightly above the center. Place the title 'QR Scanner' in a bold, dark blue font at the top. Below the viewfinder, include instructional text 'Scan a QR code to proceed' in a smaller dark gray font. Add a rectangular flashlight toggle button at the bottom with a red icon and 'Flashlight' label, using red as the accent color. Position a gallery button in the top-right corner with a blue icon. Use generous spacing and a clean, professional look with subtle shadows for depth.
